name: Mitigation Playbook for Application Layer Protocol Exploitation
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited an application layer protocol to exfiltrate sensitive data from the organization's internal network.

action--c3b8f5e7-6d8f-48a3-ba9e-f6c62a2e.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--c3b8f5e7-6d8f-48a3-ba9e-f6c62a2e.description: Take the affected host offline to prevent further data exfiltration.

parallel--b928605f-2e87-44dc-93dd-15ee40.name: Log Analysis and Traffic Blocking
parallel--b928605f-2e87-44dc-93dd-15ee40.description: Analyze traffic logs and deploy firewall rules to block malicious connections.

action--d7a2f63e-13e9-4a86-b7b5-3c63a183.name: Analyze traffic logs for suspicious patterns
action--d7a2f63e-13e9-4a86-b7b5-3c63a183.description: Check the traffic logs for any suspicious patterns related to the affected host.

action--a23bc82d-d939-47f8-b999-f1b8b1c0.name: Deploy a web application firewall rule
action--a23bc82d-d939-47f8-b999-f1b8b1c0.description: Block outbound connections to the command and control server.
